CSS
format:
<style>
  body {
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
    55deg,
    #282C33 0%,
    #3e4147 50%,
    #282C33 100%
    ) !important;
  }
  #Dashboard_Recipes{
    //background-image: url("C:\Users\User\Pictures\Image1.jpg");
    //background-color: blue;
    border-style: none;

  }
  /*Header background colour*/
  md-content[ng-if="main.loaded"] md-toolbar {
    background-color: #2C506B !important;
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #2C506B;
  }

  /*Header Text*/
  h1 {
    color: #faebd7 !important;
    font-weight: 500 !important;
  }

  /*Background colour*/
  md-content[ng-if="main.loaded"] section {
    //background-color: #282C33;
  }
  /*Group name colour*/
  p[class="nr-dashboard-cardtitle"] {
    //color: #706F6F !important;
    color: #faebd7 !important;
  }

  /*Buttons */
  /*Default*/
  button {
    background-color: #3981B8 !important;
    border-radius: 8px !important;
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px rgba(44, 80, 107, 1) !important;
    border-radius: 6px !important;
  }
  button:hover {
    background-color: rgba(57, 129, 184, 0.7) !important;
    border-radius: 6px !important;
  }
  .logout {
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
  }
  .save button:hover, button.nr-dashboard-form-button[type="submit"]:hover {
  background-color: rgba(26, 199, 40, 1) !important;
  border-radius: 6px !important;

  color: black !important;
  }
  .clear button:hover, button.nr-dashboard-form-button[type="button"]:hover{
  background-color: #e31e35 !important;
  color black !important;
  }
  /*Default switch icons (when switched on)*/
  /*Switch bar*/
  md-switch.md-checked .md-bar { 
    background-color: #13851c!important;
  }
  /*switch ball*/
  md-switch.md-checked .md-thumb {
    background-color: #1ac728 !important;
  }
  /*Menu button*/
  button[aria-label="menu button"] {
    background: transparent !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
  }
  /*Refresh button on Settings tab*/
  md-card[node-class="indent"] {
    margin-left: 16px !important;
  }

  /*Side Nav*/
  button.md-no-style.md-button {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    border-radius: 0px !important;
  }
  .nr-menu-item-active div button { 
    border-right: 4px solid #3981B8 !important;
  }
  body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner { /*Side nav Text*/
    color: #95B0D5 !important;
  }
  md-sidenav {
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px #2C506B;
  }

  /*Input fields*/
  md-input-container.md-default-theme .md-input, md-input-container .md-input, .md-select-value {
    border-color: #EfA705 !important;
  }

  /*All Panels*/
  ui-card-panel {
    border-radius: 6px;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px #2C506B;
    border-style: none !important;
    background-color: rgba(51,51,51,255) !important;
  }
  #Recipes_Test_Name {
    display: grid !important;
    place-items: center !important;
  }
  /*Status message*/
  [node-id=d6300eb99d1c25a1] [class="value"] {
    color: #e31e35 !important;
  }
  .save button  {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    text-align: center;
    width: 50% ;
    transition-duration: 0.4s;
    background-color: #ddffdd;
    color: white;         
  }

  /*Table rows*/
  .tabulator-headers > div {
    background-color: #f5ca69 !important;
  }
  .tabulator-row.tabulator-selectable.tabulator-row-odd {
    background-color: #b0cde3 !important;
  }
  .tabulator-row.tabulator-selectable.tabulator-row-even {
    background-color: #f9dc9b !important;
  }
  .chart {
    //background-color: green;
  }
</style>

name: Function
Function
func:
let pld =       "SELECT ID, Topic, Payload, Timestamp "
pld = pld + "FROM [NodeRed].[dbo].[Basic_Test] "
pld = pld + "WHERE id = " + msg.payload

msg.payload = pld
return msg;

name: Function
func:
d = new Date(),
dformat = [d.getMonth()+1,
    d.getDate(),
    d.getFullYear()].join('/')+' '+
    [d.getHours(),
    d.getMinutes(),
    d.getSeconds()].join(':');

pld =       "INSERT INTO [Dev].[dbo].[MQTTData] "
pld = pld + "(Topic, Payload, Timestamp) "
pld = pld + "VALUES ('" + msg.topic + "', '" + msg.payload + "', '" + dformat + "')"

msg.topic = ''
msg.payload = pld
return msg;

name: Node-Red Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<style>

    /*Main background*/
    
    body {
    
        background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
            55deg,
            #009785 0%,
            #245aa5 50%,
            #b800e9 100%
            );
            
            //background-image: url("C:\Users\User\Pictures\Image1.jpg") !important;
            /*
            background-image: url("images\Image1.jpg") !important; // file path
            background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
            background-size: auto !important;
            background-position: bottom left !important;
            */
    }

    /*Top bar*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: transparent !important;
        color: #FFFFFF;// !important;
    }

    //testing
    .nr-dashboard-chart-title {
        color: 5566FF !important;
    }


    /*Left menu*/
    /*Sidebar*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        color: white !important;
        background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;
    }
    /*Hover selection*/
    a.md-no-style, button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }
    /*Selected*/
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 4px solid rgb(41 98 255) !important;
    }
    /*List*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: white !important;
        background-color: rgba(40,85,165,1) !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }


    /*Groups*/
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        box-shadow: rgba(25,90,85,0.35) 0px 5px 15px !important;}
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        border: none !important;
    }
    /*Name groups*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
    }


    /*Bouttons*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.1);// !important;
    }
    .md-button {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }


    /*Dropdown menu*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu{
        background-color: rgba(40,85,165,1) !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu, .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .md-select-menu-container {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        border: none !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: white !important;
        background-color: #1a3566 !important;
    }

    /*Template*/
    md-card>img, md-card>md-card-header img, md-card md-card-title-media img {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    /* Color picker text BG */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .color-picker-input-wrapper > input {
        color: white !important;
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }

</style>
